title: Shares of several financial services companies are trading lower amid mixed bank earnings this week. Morgan Stanley today reported worse-than-expected Q1 results.
Shares of several financial services companies are trading lower amid the global coronavirus outbreak, which has hampered economic growth outlook and affected a wide array of industries.

Shares of several financial services companies are trading lower as the coronavirus spread continues to cause concerns of economic slowdown after China confirmed over 9,000 confirmed cases.  NOTE: The coronavirus outbreak has caused selloffs in global markets.
